name: 2FLY Airborne - Merritt Island
about: 2FLY Airborne, founded in 1994, is one of the largest independent providers of flight training in the United States. Headquartered in Merritt Island, Florida, the school operates under the highest standards set by the FAA and EASA, offering both American FAA and European EASA license training programs. Our training is conducted under FAA Part 141 and 61 prescribed training outlines, ensuring top-notch education. With a climate ideal for professional pilot training, our students are exposed to a variety of instrument approach procedures and extensive radio communication practice. Our management team boasts over 50,000 combined flight hours and 35 years of aviation experience, ensuring operations exceed the highest standards for flight training, maintenance, and safety. We pride ourselves on a personalized experience with manageable student numbers, and we offer monthly payment plans for our career programs. 2FLY Airborne is committed to producing graduate pilots of the highest caliber.
